::: {.column-margin}
**cviBaker2042** (2024). G. Bisaccia. *Under active development*.
:::

Custom-made application for exportation of Circle CVi42 study reports to [Redcap](https://www.project-redcap.org) import-ready CSV files. A local version of this app was used in my [PhD thesis](../../portfolio/phd/index.qmd).
